title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Science Field Workshops for Remote Education Management and Student Experience Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more effective educational management strategies in LMS-based remote learning environments
Learners can design two or more support plans to improve student experiences in remote science learning courses
Learners can analyze formative assessment results to develop educational content improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
